QuestData.Title: The Rescue of Herbert Gloomburst
QuestData.Description:
The harpies plan to sacrifice the expedition's mage, a Forsaken by the name of Herbert Gloomburst.
Our foes seek to use this vile necromancy even on the undead.
Herbert's ethics are... questionable, but he always strives to serve the Horde. We'll need his magic to stop the ogres.
Let's move.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Herbert Gloomburst from the harpies' necromantic ritual
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Herbert Gloomburst at the Harpy Roost entrance.
QuestData.RewardText:
Thanks for the save! They must be desperate for sacrifices if they wanted to use someone who's already dead.
If anyone is going to drain my life essence to use in a forbidden ritual, it's going to be me!
